definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: foundation, (mountain-) slope (cf. supr.)—only pl. abs. [[אֲשֵׁדוֹת]] Jos 10:40, Jos 12:8; cstr. [[אַשְׁדּוֹת]] Jos 12:3, Jos 13:20; [[אַשְׁדּׂת]] De 3:17, De 4:49—mountain-slopes Jos 10:40 ´[[ההר והנגב והשׁפלה והא]]; Jos 12:8 (‖ id. + [[מדבר]]); elsewhere defined ´[[תַּחַת א]] [[הַפִּסְגׇּה]] De 3:17, De 4:49, Jos 12:3 cf. Jos 13:20.
